solution_line_template: The total area of each blanket is {blanket_side_length}*{blanket_side_length}=<<{blanket_side_length}*{blanket_side_length}={area_each_blanket}>>{area_each_blanket}
Their total area is {total_unfolded_area} square feet because {num_blankets} x {area_each_blanket} = <<{num_blankets}*{area_each_blanket}={total_unfolded_area}>>{total_unfolded_area}
